articles.title: Apple, Dyson and Ecovacs: The big ticket items shoppers can't get enough of from Amazon Australia's epic Prime Day sale
articles.author: CINDY TRAN
articles.summary: Amazon is offering numerous products at reduced prices during its Prime Day sale. Several companies are featured, including Dyson with its V15 Detect Absolute vacuum, Theragun with its Elite (5th generation) massage device, ECOVACS with the DEEBOT T30 OMNI robot vacuum and mop, and FUJIFILM with its X-T50 camera, alongside many other product launches from companies like Oral-B, Apple, and Kogan.

articles.title: DJI's waterproof 4K action camera is just $199 for Prime Day
articles.author: Stan Horaczek
articles.summary: During Prime Day, DJI is offering the Osmo action camera Essentials bundle for $199, a $50 reduction. Other DJI products like a gimbal stabilizer for smartphones and a drone are also on sale. The Osmo action camera can capture 4K footage at up to 120 fps and is waterproof down to 18 meters.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: AI-Powered Innovations Redefine Mobile Experiences
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 foldable smartphones and unveiled the Galaxy S25 series featuring AI-powered image processing, real-time translation, and adaptive battery management. The Galaxy Z Fold6 introduces AI-enhanced multi-window assistance and S Pen integration. They also announced a new SuperFast Wireless Charging standard, capable of delivering up to 25W of power wirelessly.

articles.title: Booster for the European AI ecosystem
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: The European AI-on Demand platform (Aiod) has launched as a central hub for AI in Europe, offering new services to both research and business sectors. Aiod provides AI tools, data, and services, including market-ready applications and development environments for SMEs and startups. The platform supports the entire AI lifecycle from concept to market readiness, featuring tools like AI Builder and Ai Runner.

articles.title: Popular digital kitchen is planning debut in this N.J. county. Here's where.
articles.author: Christopher Burch
articles.summary: Wonder, a digital food hall, is expanding its service to Mount Laurel in Burlington County, New Jersey, with an expected opening in September. The company will occupy a space previously used by PNC Bank.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked: Galaxy Z Foldables Finally Get Competitive
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung is aiming to reclaim its position in the foldable smartphone market. The company plans to achieve this by introducing the new Galaxy Z 7 series.

articles.title: Walmart has Nintendo Switch markdowns up to $120 off during its Deals Sale
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Walmart is offering new discounts on the Nintendo Switch as part of its Deals Sale.

articles.title: Elon Musk's New Venture: xAI Unveiled
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Elon Musk unveiled xAI, a new artificial intelligence company. Musk clarified xAI is not currently seeking external funding. xAI aims to innovate in the AI sector.

articles.title: Eufy E28 Omni Robot Vacuum & Mop Drops to $785 on Amazon Prime
articles.summary: Eufy launched the E28 Omni, a robot vacuum and mop featuring an Omni Station for hands-free cleaning. Key features include the HydroJet System for mop cleaning, a detachable FlexiOne Portable Deep Cleaner, 20,000 Pa Turbo Suction, and the Omni Station which handles self-emptying, mop washing, drying, and water refilling.

articles.title: TikTok viral Tyler Candle Diva Wash for ‘luxurious' laundry gets $30 price drop at Walmart
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: Tyler Candle has launched the Diva Glamorous Wash Liquid Laundry Detergent, which is currently on sale for $60 at Walmart. The detergent is described as a high-end perfume in liquid form, suitable for delicate fabrics, and safe for high-efficiency machines. It is rated 4.7/5 stars on Walmart's website.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 is almost over — shop the best last-minute deals in Canada, up to 83% off
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: During Amazon Prime Day 2025, various companies such as Apple, Dyson, Ninja, and Shark are offering significant discounts on their products. Deals include discounts on products such as Bluetooth Smart Watches, Power Stations, Cordless Vacuum Cleaners, Wireless Earbuds, and Air Purifiers. Amazon is also offering a chance to win huge prizes with every Amazon or Prime Video purchase of $20 or more through Amazon's Giftmania.

articles.title: Shhhhh we found a last-minute Prime Day deal: Save $170 on Dyson's most popular vacuum 🤫
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 36% discount on the Dyson V8 Plus Cordless Vacuum during Prime Day. The Dyson V8 Plus Cordless Vacuum includes attachments such as a mini soft dusting brush, hair screw tool, crevice tool and the Motorbar cleaner head and provides up to 40 minutes of power on a full charge.

articles.title: Walmart's Ninja Cold Press Juicer Pro is a ‘lifestyle transformation machine,' and its less than $100 right now
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the Ninja Cold Press Juicer Pro for $92.99 as part of a limited-time deal ending July 13. The juicer features cold press technology, total pulp control with two filters, and dishwasher-safe parts, designed for efficient juice extraction with less foam. It has two modes: Start/Stop and Reverse.

articles.title: MAAS Announces Signing of Acquisition Framework Agreement  Jul. 11, 2025 20:30
org: Qingdao Youdian New Energy Technology Co., Ltd
Qingdao Huijulaixi Intelligent Technology Co., Ltd
articles.summary: Maase Inc. plans to acquire Youdian, known for its 'Xiaoli Charging' mobile charging robot and residential energy solutions like outdoor mobile energy storage units. The acquisition also includes LaiXi, a company specializing in intelligent unmanned car wash systems. These acquisitions aim to strategically expand MAAS's presence in the new energy technology and intelligent service sectors.

articles.title: Samsung Exec Talks Galaxy Z Fold 7, Design And The Importance Of AI
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its newest foldable phones, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Flip 7. The phones boast improved durability, an enhanced AI experience, and a thinner design compared to previous models. Samsung emphasizes the integration of multimodal AI for a more personalized user experience.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025: Best Beauty Product Deals in Australia
articles.author: Philippa Tonkin
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day 2025 features significant discounts on beauty products. Maybelline New York Sky High Mascara is offered at $9.94, La Roche-Posay Cicaplast Baume B5+ has a 20% discount, and the Dyson Airwrap Multi-Styler has a substantial price reduction of $314. Additionally, the Braun IPL Pro 5 PL5157 is available with a 61% discount.

articles.title: NIO stock surges over 4% after Morgan Stanley says Buy following new SUV Onvo L90 launch
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: NIO launched its first three-row SUV under its new sub-brand, Onvo, called the L90. Pre-orders for the Onvo L90, which started on July 10, have met internal targets, with deliveries scheduled to begin August 1. The Onvo L90 is priced starting at 279,000 yuan ($39,000) for the 85 kWh version and includes features like 900V fast charging, AR-HUD, air suspension, and Nvidia's Orin-X smart driving platform.

articles.title: Local 5 Top Stories: Week of July 6
articles.summary: WeAreIowa provides streaming on phones. Users need the WeAreIowa app to access the streaming service.

articles.title: Want to buy Canadian on Prime Day? 20 Canadian products you can buy on sale on Amazon Canada
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: Several Canadian brands introduced or promoted their products during Amazon Prime Day. These products include collagen peptides from grass-fed cattle, color-safe shampoo by Design.Me, Febreze Fresh Clean Scent garbage bags, superfood powder, anti-aging moisturizers from Maritime Naturals, and the introduction of Paume's overnight hand and foot mask.

articles.title: Foldable AI Powerhouse Rolls Out at Unpacked 2025
articles.author: Undercovered Deep Insights
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, featuring AI integration with Google's Gemini, a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, and upgraded photography capabilities. Additionally, the Z Flip7 and Flip7 FE have been released, along with the Galaxy Watch8 lineup, which is now powered by Gemini AI. Pre-orders for the Galaxy Z Fold7 start today, with delivery from July 25.

articles.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 Heart of Chornobyl — PS5 Announcement Trailer
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Sony is launching the PlayStation 5 (PS5). The announcement focuses on the PS5 launch date.

articles.title: Red Lobster CEO Announces Huge Update Just Days After Fans Called for Change
articles.author: Danielle Harling
articles.summary: Red Lobster launched new seafood boils and, based on customer feedback, CEO Damola Adamolekun quickly announced updates including new flavor options like Old Bay and Parmesan, and the ability to add sausage.  Customers can now select original, spicy, or extra spicy versions of the boils.

articles.title: WATCH LIVE: Tracking severe storms, tornado potential and heavy rain Friday evening
articles.summary: The WeAreIowa app allows users to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones.

articles.title: Android Circuit: Galaxy Unpacked Reviewed, OnePlus' New Releases, Niagara's Theme Support
articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, Z Flip7, Z Flip7 FE, Galaxy Watch8, and Watch8 Class, emphasizing AI integration for ambient intelligence. OnePlus introduced the OnePlus Buds, OnePlus Watch 3, OnePlus Pad Lite, OnePlus Nord CE 5, and OnePlus Nord 5 to the European market. Niagara released a major update with theme support for its launcher.

articles.title: Summer Company showcase highlights young entrepreneurs from Cornwall, SDG
articles.author: Shawna O'Neill
articles.summary: The Cornwall Business Enterprise Centre's 2025 Summer Company program showcased eight young entrepreneurs, who are: Aditya Kadyan with Carshine, Daksh Sahu with DVWN, Hudson Gibbs with Power Shot Academy (PSA), Julia Butlin with Glass by Jules, Milo Hatton with Normal is Boring, Muminah Hafizi with Pop of Joy, Nicholas Mondoux with Sparkle and Shine, and William Beaumont with Greener Acres Lawn Care. Funded by the Government of Ontario, participants receive $3,000 in start-up funding assistance, as well as hands-on coaching and mentoring.

articles.title: Have you ever vacuumed your mattress? Do it for less with this last-chance Prime Day deal
articles.author: David Hoffman
articles.summary: During Amazon Prime Day 2025, the Hersven Mattress Vacuum Cleaner is being offered at a 46% discount. This cleaner features a HEPA filter and a pulsation pad to remove dust and dirt from mattresses, and it is available on Amazon.

articles.title: Have you ever vacuumed your mattress? Do it for less with this last-chance Prime Day deal
articles.author: David Hoffman
articles.summary: Hersven is offering its Mattress Vacuum Cleaner at a discounted price of $59.84 (originally $109.99) during Amazon Prime Day. The vacuum cleaner features a HEPA filter and a pulsation pad that vibrates to remove dust and dirt. This deal provides a 46% discount on the product.

articles.title: These Prime Day sleep deals will make Rip Van Winkle jealous — save up to 70% on pillows and more
articles.author: Carrie McCabe
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day offers deals on various products aimed at improving sleep quality, including pillows, bedding, mattresses, overnight masks, and moisturizers. Amazon Prime members get free shipping, while non-members receive free shipping on orders over $35.

articles.title: YD Hardware Launches New Line of Durable and Innovative Kitchen Products
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: YD Hardware has launched its latest kitchen product line, featuring durable, high-performing, and stylish kitchen tools designed to simplify meal preparation and enhance the cooking experience.

articles.title: I swear by this body cleanser to exfoliate my skin - and it's £16 this Prime Day
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Naturium's The Smoother Glycolic Acid Exfoliating Body Wash is featured in Amazon's Prime Day sale. The body wash is formulated with glycolic, lactic, and pyruvic acids, along with red algae, to gently exfoliate and soothe the skin. It's available for £16, reduced from £18 for a 500ml bottle.

articles.title: Camry takes it up another notch
articles.summary: Toyota has launched the 10th-generation Camry, featuring enhancements to its petrol-electric hybrid system with a more powerful electric motor and efficient transaxle. The new Camry includes safety features under Toyota's Safety Sense banner and offers three variants: GX, SX, and ZR, each with different standard features and technologies.

articles.title: The Ellavate wagon review: Is an electric-powered stroller wagon really worth it?
articles.author: Elizabeth Tenety
articles.summary: The Ellavate Wagon, the first electric-powered stroller wagon, has been launched. Designed to carry up to 200 pounds, it features electric assist, all-terrain tires, a folding design, built-in child comfort features, smart safety features, and customizable accessories. It targets families who need to haul multiple kids and gear, and retails for $1,999.

articles.title: These Prime Day vacuum deals are cleaning up after today. Shop final hours of sale
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Roborock is promoting its Q7 M5+ Robot Vacuum and Mop featuring 10,000 Pa of suction power and a self-emptying base station. The article also features other robot vacuums from Narwal, Shark and eufy. Bissell is highlighting its Little Green Carpet Cleaner and PowerClean FurGuard Cordless Vacuum while Dyson is offering discounts on its V15 Detect Plus and V11 Origin Cordless Vacuums.

articles.title: Retailer rings in the future of smartphones with launch of AI-powered foldables
articles.author: Aida Ahmad
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7 smartphones, featuring AI integration, improved designs, and enhanced functionalities. Pre-order promotions are available at Harvey Norman stores and online, offering benefits like storage upgrades and e-vouchers. The Galaxy Z Fold7 boasts a larger screen and a 200MP camera, while the Galaxy Z Flip7 offers a compact design with a 50MP dual FlexCam.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day live: Final day to bag these editor-approved discounts
articles.author: Daisy Lester
articles.summary: During Amazon Prime Day 2025, companies like Apple, Sony, Dyson, Shark, Ninja, Oral-B, and others offered significant discounts on various products. New products launched earlier in the year, such as the 11th-generation iPad, Sony WF-1000XM5 and LG C4 TV, also received their first major price drops, making them more accessible to consumers. Many of these discounted items and sales of new models were touted as the lowest prices ever seen.

articles.title: Genus AI Launches Sage: AI Growth Agent for E-Commerce Brands
articles.summary: Genus AI has launched Sage, an AI Growth Agent aimed at transforming how D2C and e-commerce brands scale across digital channels. Sage unifies creative generation, product catalog management, digital campaigns, customer insights, and order data for brands leveraging Shopify and Meta platforms. It enhances product catalogs, optimizes campaigns, and provides real-time visibility into the customer lifecycle.

articles.title: Editor favourites: The Amazon Prime Day deals we actually bought
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: During Amazon Prime Day 2025, shoppers can find deals on various products. New flavors of Liquid I.V. electrolyte mixes, such as fruit punch, are available. Canon printers, Philips Hue smart lights, SEEN curly cream, and Orgain protein powder are among the popular discounted items. Shoppers are also stocking up on essential items like toilet paper, ergonomic mice, AA batteries, and protein bars during the sale.

articles.title: Burger King Launching New Whopper Based On Customer Requests
articles.author: Suzanne Blake
articles.summary: Burger King has introduced the BBQ Brisket Whopper, which features slow-cooked BBQ brisket, crispy onions and a flame-grilled quarter-pound beef patty. The company also launched the "Whopper by You" platform to allow customers to submit ideas for Whopper sandwiches, directly influencing menu innovations. The BBQ Brisket Whopper will be available as a Whopper Jr. and at participating U.S. restaurants while supplies last.

articles.title: The circle functionality is improved: Google finally introduces a layout for horizontal mode
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Google has updated the horizontal mode interface for Android devices, featuring a new circle function for in-app searches and simultaneous text and image search capabilities. Additionally, Google introduced Android Canary, a new beta channel that replaces the existing Developer Preview program providing developers early access to the latest Android features and updates.

articles.title: Prime Day's Almost Over, Just Get the Weird Thing
articles.author: Ambar Pardilla
articles.summary: Brooklyn Peltz Beckham launched a hot sauce line featuring two flavors: 'Sweet Jalapeño,' made with brown sugar, vinegar, lime, and sel gris, and 'Hot Habanero,' a spicier option based on the Scoville scale.

articles.title: Ninja's Bestselling $119 Juicer Is Just $49 at Walmart Right Now, and Shoppers Say It Makes the 'Smoothest' Juice
articles.author: John Alexander
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Cold Press Juicer Pro. The Ninja Cold Press Juicer Pro features simple design.

articles.title: Take a look at Lush's Wimbledon-themed summer collection of treats
articles.author: Craig Jones
articles.summary: Lush has launched a new Wimbledon-themed product collection available nationwide and online. The collection includes products formulated with ingredients like fresh strawberries, oranges, magnesium, witch hazel and arnica designed to deliver an ultimate Wimbledon experience from the comfort of your own bathroom.

articles.title: Robot vacuum cleaner that 'picks up more dirt than Dyson' reduced by 50% but you have to be quick
articles.author: Courtney Eales
articles.summary: Eufy is offering its G50 Robot Vacuum Cleaner at a 50% discount for Amazon Prime Day, reducing the price from £199.99 to £99.99. The vacuum cleaner features app control, strong suction, quiet cleaning mode, a large dust bin, and an active Detangling Roller Brush. Customer reviews highlight its effective dirt pickup compared to brands like Dyson and Shark.

articles.title: NYT Connections Hints July 11: Solve the Friday puzzle #761 with these clues and answers
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Google, Photoshop, Uber, and Zoom are company names that have become commonly used as verbs. Each company's product or service is so well-known that people now use the company name as a verb to describe actions related to their offerings.

articles.title: 7-Eleven Day is today. Here's how to score a free Slurpee and more deals
articles.author: Julia Hecht
articles.summary: 7-Eleven is celebrating its birthday by offering customers a free 12-ounce Slurpee on July 11. This year, 7-Eleven is providing additional perks for loyalty members including discounts and a Slurpee-branded tongue tattoo. Customers can also shop the Birthday Collection capsule from 7Collection™, the retailer's official online merchandise shop.

articles.title: Eggstraordinary vending machine launches in Bratislava
articles.author: Petit Press
articles.summary: Babičkin dvor, Slovakia's second-largest egg supplier, launched an egg vending machine at the Nivy Shopping Centre in Bratislava. The machine features a touchscreen interface, chilled storage, and multiple payment options. The company plans to install nine additional machines in Bratislava and views vending machines as a potential future distribution channel.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day deal slashes Kärcher pressure washer to £50
articles.author: Sarah Lumley
articles.summary: Kärcher is offering the K2 Horizontal Pressure Washer at almost half price for Amazon Prime Day, reduced from £89.99 to £48.99. The K2 is designed for light dirt cleaning on patios, furniture, and cars, featuring a compact design and integrated suction mechanism for detergent application.  Bosch High Pressure Washer Universal Aquatak and ProKleen Pressure Jet Washer are also introduced as alternatives.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 is raising the bar for smartphones
articles.author: truelove
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the Galaxy Z Fold7, featuring a thinner and lighter design, an expansive screen, and an ultra 200MP camera. The Galaxy Z Fold7 will be available for pre-order starting July 9, with general availability beginning July 25 and will be available in 23 Blue Shadow, Silver Shadow and Jet-black colour options.

articles.title: The one beauty essential I always restock on Prime Day
articles.author: Sarah Vazquez
articles.summary: Ouai is offering its Detox Shampoo at a discounted price of $26 during Prime Day, a 20% reduction. This shampoo, formulated with apple cider vinegar, is designed to deeply cleanse hair by removing product buildup, dirt, and oil, promoting a healthier scalp and restoring shine and bounce.

articles.title: NxtQuantum launches Ai+ Smartphones in India with focus on data privacy and affordability
org: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
articles.summary: NxtQuantum has launched two new smartphones, the Ai+ Pulse and Ai+ Nova 5G, in India. The Ai+ Pulse is a 4G device priced at Rs 4,999, and the Ai+ Nova 5G starts at Rs 7,999. Additionally, NxtQuantum teased Wearbuds, a fitness watch and TWS earbuds rolled into one device, which is expected to be available in August.

articles.title: Review of OnePlus Buds 4: Best Buds You Can Buy in the INR 5K Category?
articles.author: Expertise. With A Talent
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the Buds 4, featuring a dual-driver system, LHDC 5.0 codec support, and ANC with noise reduction up to 55dB. The Buds 4 offer six hours of listening with ANC on, and provides nine to 10 hours of playback with 10 minutes of charging.

articles.title: All eyes on Samsung's thin new foldable
articles.author: Jacob Kastrenakes
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Z Fold 7, a foldable phone that is nearly the same thickness as an iPhone 16 Pro. This new flagship device represents a significant step towards making foldable phones mainstream due to its reduced size.

articles.title: Marketing Signals Unveils AI Search Optimisation Service to Help Brands Target AI-Powered Search Results
articles.summary: Marketing Signals launched its AI Search Optimisation service, designed to help brands dominate the AI-powered search landscape by integrating organic search, paid search, and AI-driven discovery. The new service aims to equip brands to lead with visibility, adaptability and scale in the evolving search landscape.

articles.title: Best $25 To Spend at Nordstrom's Anniversary Sale
articles.summary: Nordstrom is launching its Anniversary Sale on July 12, featuring discounted items including Kopari coconut hydrating body wash with $17 savings. Tucker + Tate kids' drawstring joggers are also highlighted, offering $10 off during the sale.

articles.title: The last bite: First it was cereal bacon, now it's bacon cereal
articles.author: Brooks Johnson
articles.summary: General Mills and Hormel released Cinnamon Toast Crunch-flavored bacon and bacon-flavored Cinnamon Toast Crunch, available for a limited time on Walmart.com for $5.84. T-Rex Cookie Co. recently announced its first round of investors to expand their reach and grow their mission.

articles.title: Philly French Fry Day Deals: Where to Get Your Fry Fix!
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: The French fry is evolving with data-driven customization via AI analyzing customer preferences and suggesting personalized fry combinations tailored to dietary needs. Restaurants are leveraging technology like automated fry stations and exploring drone delivery to optimize offerings, reduce waste, and improve efficiency. Simultaneously, the industry is focusing on sustainability through responsible sourcing and alternative uses for fry oil.

articles.title: 21st Century, trusted by 67% of the JSE, adopts Africa's first AI-powered front-of-house platform
articles.author: Sat Articles
articles.summary: 21st Century has integrated askAYYI, an intelligent business assistant developed by Retail Communication Solutions, into its website to redefine client engagement. askAYYI acts as a 24/7 digital concierge, providing real-time support across platforms. The integration of askAYYI represents a new benchmark for digital intelligent engagement in the sector for 21st Century.

articles.title: The 26 Prime Day Vacuum Deals I Recommend Shopping Before They Expire
articles.author: Alicia Betz
articles.summary: Dyson, iRobot, and Shark are offering significant Prime Day discounts on various vacuum models, including the Dyson V15 Detect, iRobot Roomba i3+, and Shark NV352. These deals include some of the lowest prices of the year, with models selected based on performance, features, and suitability for specific needs like pet hair removal and allergy reduction.

articles.title: A Lightweight Cordless Vacuum Is 73% Off for Amazon Prime Members
articles.author: Maggie Horton
articles.summary: Ljuren launched its Cordless Stick Vacuum, featuring an 85,000 RPM motor, 12 kilopascals of suction power, and a five-layer filtration system including a HEPA filter. It is available on Amazon for \$110 for Prime members and has a runtime of up to 35 minutes. The article also mentions other vacuum deals from Smoture, Afnop, Bissell, Shark, and Eufy that are also available on Amazon.

articles.title: "They're being hypocrites, they are lying": Duke Dennis responds to backlash over AMP's skincare brand launch
articles.author: Global Sports Desk
articles.summary: AMP, co-founded by Duke Dennis, launched its personal care line, TONE, in Target stores on July 7th. The TONE line includes products like deodorant, body wash, cologne, and lip balm. AMP plans to expand TONE to other stores and supermarkets.

articles.title: 50 Amazon Prime Day 2025 Deals Just for Prime Members
articles.author: Clara Mcmahon
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day 2025 features discounts on various products. Noteworthy deals include the Apple AirPods 4 with noise cancellation, the Apple Watch Series 10 with health tracking features, the Fire TV Stick 4K streaming device, the Ninja Creami Ice Cream Maker, and the Dyson Airwrap Origin for hair styling.

articles.title: Takealot to launch exclusive MVP Days sale in July
articles.author: Angelica Rhoda
articles.summary: Takealot is launching its annual MVP Days sale, a five-day promotional event in July exclusively for TakealotMORE subscribers. The event offers members-only discounts, bonus coupons and limited-time deals across Takealot and Mr D, their food delivery platform. TakealotMORE members receive benefits such as free deliveries and early access to sales.

articles.title: What is Glycolic Acid? Here's Why You Should Be Shopping the Ingredient This Prime Day
articles.author: Shannon Garlin
articles.summary: The article features several skincare products containing Glycolic Acid, including AcneFree's Acne Free Oil-Free Cleanser for acne treatment, L'Oreal's anti-aging serum targeting dark spots and wrinkles, Peter Thomas Roth's resurfacing serum addressing multiple skin concerns, and Dr. Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel wipes for exfoliation. These products claim to offer various benefits such as acne treatment, anti-aging, exfoliation, and skin texture improvement.

articles.title: ‘Grameenphone One' unveils new ecosystem to redefine customers'
articles.author: Prothom Alo English Desk
articles.summary: Grameenphone launched 'Grameenphone One', a unified digital ecosystem designed to offer fast and secure connectivity and also introduced 'GP Shield', a product aimed at ensuring secured and responsible connectivity. These are new services intended to empower the youth and enhance digital access in Bangladesh.

articles.title: Collaboration Is Fuelling the ‘Farmpreneur' Movement
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Garlic Meadow farm has expanded its product line to include goats' milk skincare products and sheep's milk cheeses, sold online and at local markets. Vale of Glamorgan Council recently launched the Taste of the Vale directory, which aims to connect residents and visitors with local food producers. The directory highlights the county's food and farming heritage, and provides a guide to local producers, vineyards, dairies, bakeries, and more.

articles.title: Next's 'comfy and elegant' €50 black dress is perfect for summer events
articles.author: Ruairi Scott Byrne
articles.summary: Next is promoting its new summer dress collection, including the Friends Like These Black V-Neck Flutter Sleeve Midi Dress (€50), available in multiple sizes and colors, receiving positive customer reviews. The collection also features the Jersey Midi Summer Dress (€31.50) and the Multi Bright Puff Sleeve Off Shoulder Midi Dress (€45), both designed for warm weather and offered in various sizes and lengths.

articles.title: Score This 'Perfect Miracle' Power Scrubber For Only $13 While You Can
articles.author: Sakinah Ali
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Rubbermaid Reveal Power Scrubber at a discounted price of $13 during Prime Day. This scrubber is designed to clean tough areas quickly and efficiently, featuring an oscillating head, two modes, and a water-resistant build. Reviewers praise its ability to save time and effort in cleaning various surfaces.

articles.title: I'm A Prime Day Pro — Here's Why I Only Care About These 11 Deals
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: During Amazon's Prime Day sales, Owala offers its new FreeSip Twist water bottle. Clinique provides discounted Almost Lipstick tinted lip balm, while Touchland presents its Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer spray trio. Apple's AirTags are also on sale, alongside Magna-Tiles. Away offers discounts on its Bigger carry-on luggage, Iope promotes its PDRN Caffeine Shot serum, and Gorilla Grip discounts its absorbent and slip-resistant bath mat. Additionally, Dawn provides a sale on its Platinum Plus Powerwash dish spray.

articles.title: Amazon Just Knocked $150+ Off This Popular Cordless Dyson Vacuum, But It Won't Last Long
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Dyson V8 cordless vacuum cleaner is on sale for Prime Day at 36% off its original price on Amazon. The vacuum features strong suction, whole-machine filtration, and an easy-empty design. The V8′s versatile design allows it to transform into a small handheld vacuum and comes with several attachments.

articles.title: I'm a shopping expert and I just know Alison Hammond's black and white milkmaid dress is going to be a hit
articles.author: Leanne Bayley
articles.summary: New Look launched the Curves Black Shell Print Milkmaid Midi Dress, which was worn by Alison Hammond on 'This Morning'. The dress features a monochrome print, milkmaid silhouette, square tie neck, puff sleeves, and button-through design and currently on sale.

articles.title: The 114 Best Prime Day Deals, According to Our Writers
articles.author: Erin Schwartz
articles.summary: During Amazon Prime Day, numerous products are on sale, including mosquito repellent, sunscreen, protein shakes, bath and beauty items, household essentials, skin care, trash bags, teeth-whitening strips, fashion items from Gap, Madewell, and Levi's, home essentials, vacuums, skin-care routines, Apple products, Coway air purifiers, Boll & Branch sheets, Zinus bed frames, strollers, toys from Magna-Tiles and Fisher-Price, hair-care products, Alex Mill cardigans, Baggu items, fancy pillows, sleep essentials, coffee-making tools, dorm room items, cotton quilts, summer essentials, Speedos, and rash guards.

articles.title: 10 songs that were hyperpop before the subgenre was born
articles.author: Miguel Perez
articles.summary: SOPHIE's 'PRODUCT', released in 2015, is celebrating its 10th anniversary and is considered a key project that helped push hyperpop into the mainstream. This release marked a significant moment in the subculture's growth, contributing to its spread beyond internet communities and influencing other artists.

articles.title: You'll Never Guess What McDonald's Just Brought Back
articles.author: Sue Moll Sue Moll Published:
articles.summary: McDonald's is reintroducing its Snack Wraps to revive sales. The Snack Wrap features crispy chicken, lettuce, cheese, and sauce in a soft tortilla.

articles.title: Samsung's AI super-powered Galaxy Z Fold7 has arrived
articles.summary: Samsung introduces the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable smartphone that combines Galaxy design, camera functionality, and AI innovation. It is the thinnest and lightest device in the Galaxy Z Fold series, featuring a larger display and the new One UI 8. The device delivers premium performance and integrates intelligent, multimodal agents.

articles.title: Samsung's AI super-powered Galaxy Z Fold7 has arrived
articles.author: Times LIVE
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable smartphone featuring a thinner and lighter design, an enhanced display, and advanced AI capabilities. It is available in multiple colors and offers increased storage options. It will be available from July 25 and pre-orders are now open with storage upgrade deals.

articles.title: LuLu expands its presence in KSA; launches new hypermarket in Al-Baghdadiyah, Jeddah
articles.summary: LuLu Retail has launched a new hypermarket in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, located in the Al-Baghdadiyah district. The hypermarket offers a wide array of retail sections, including a supermarket, fresh food zones, electronics, fashion, and specialty counters like BLSH and Eye Express. To celebrate the opening, exclusive inaugural offers are available across all departments.

articles.title: Samsung unveils Galaxy Z Fold7, Flip7, and Watch8 with AI-powered upgrades at Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy Z Fold7, Flip7, Flip7 FE, and Watch8 series featuring Galaxy AI at Galaxy Unpacked 2025. The Galaxy Z Fold7 is the slimmest Fold device with a 200MP camera and AI tools. The Galaxy Watch8 introduces health-focused innovation with features like Running Coach and Antioxidant Index.

articles.title: Eco-friendly detergent sheets aim to revolutionise laundry routines
articles.author: Manisha Bhanot
articles.summary: Asevi, a Spanish household cleaning brand, has launched Asevi Bands, innovative concentrated detergent sheets designed for easy and effective laundry. The sheets are hypoallergenic, dermatologically tested, and biodegradable, available in Power Fresh and Colour Protect ranges to cater to different needs like fragrance and color preservation.

articles.title: Santander offering free £180 cash to new and existing customers
articles.author: Kate Lally SEO writer
articles.summary: Santander launched a new incentive program at the end of May, offering £180 to new and existing customers who switch their accounts to Santander Everyday, Edge, Edge Up, or Private current accounts using the Current Account Switch Service (CASS). To qualify, customers must deposit at least £1,500 within 60 days and set up at least two active household direct debits.

articles.title: UK bank handing out free £180 payments
articles.author: Kate Lally
articles.summary: Santander launched a new incentive program at the end of May, offering £180 to new and existing customers who switch to a Santander Everyday, Edge, Edge Up, or Private current account. To qualify, customers must use the Current Account Switch Service (CASS), deposit at least £1,500 within 60 days, and set up at least two active household direct debits.

articles.title: Amazon Launches 10-Minute Delivery Service in Delhi Through ‘Amazon Now'
articles.author: Bhumika Lenka
articles.summary: Amazon India has launched 'Amazon Now', an ultra-fast delivery service promising 10-minute delivery of essential items. The service initially launched in West Delhi and is planned to expand to other metro cities. This move aims to address the increasing demand for instant delivery of daily essentials and intensify competition in the quick-commerce sector.

articles.title: Flipkart will now let you exchange your old phone for new one in just 40 minutes, here is how it works
articles.summary: Flipkart has launched an express exchange service under its Flipkart Minutes platform, enabling customers to exchange old smartphones for new ones in under 40 minutes. The service involves instant valuation, doorstep pickup, and immediate application of the exchange value toward the new phone purchase. This service is currently available in select parts of Bengaluru, Delhi, and Mumbai and will be available in additional cities across India in the coming days.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day Ends Soon — We've Vetted 87 Deals That Are Worth It
articles.summary: Several companies are offering discounts on their products during Prime Day. LifeStraw is offering deals on its personal water filters, and ColorWow is offering deals on Dreamcoat Spray, a hair product designed to reduce frizz. Vital Proteins is offering deals on collagen peptide powder, which helps support hair, skin, nail, bone and joint health.

articles.title: Fast Lane: BYD, Inchcape, BMW Motorrad, Lotus, Porsche
articles.author: Lee Nian Tjoe
articles.summary: BYD will officially launch the Sealion 6 DM-i on July 16. This plug-in hybrid SUV is the first of its kind from the Chinese brand for Singapore. Its operating range is said to be 1,100km.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7, and Z Flip 7 FE Firmware Updates Released
articles.summary: Samsung has released the first firmware updates for the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7, and Z Flip 7 FE, released on July 11, 2025. The updates enhance performance, improve camera capabilities, and bolster security across all three devices; also feature enhancements to Flex Mode, S Pen improvements, cover screen enhancements, system stability, and connectivity improvements.

articles.title: If Your Birth Year Starts With '19', These 49 'Boring' Products Will Probably Excite You
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article highlights several new products, including SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes for sweat control, Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo for reviving greasy hair, Medicube's "Zero Pore" Pads for smoother skin, and Rael "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches for treating blemishes. Additionally, it mentions Venus Visage teeth whitening pens for brighter smiles and Elizavecca's Collagen Coating Hair Protein Treatment for frizz-free hair.

articles.title: Why Gen Z will be the biggest and boldest founders yet
articles.author: Sarah Gill
articles.summary: The Pitch 2025, a partnership between IMAGE and Samsung, is a competition designed to spotlight the next generation of leaders. The competition aims to identify and promote early-stage founders and the innovative products or platforms they are building. It offers a technology suite, media visibility, mentorship, and a platform to connect with people who can help them scale.

articles.title: Live: Prime Day ends tonight — these are the 73+ best deals actually worth shopping before prices go up
articles.author: Zoe Malin
articles.summary: During Prime Day, Amazon introduced discounts across various categories. Specific deals included savings on products from companies like Crocs, Apple, Dyson, Premier Protein, Away, Elemis, Poppi, Samsonite, Liquid Death, Tushy, Bob's Red Mill, Philips Sonicare, Huggies, Dawn, Duracell, Tide, Dreft, Gain, Cottonelle, Seventh Generation, Mrs. Meyer's, Swiffer, Laneige, Cetaphil, Kiehl's, Tatcha, First Aid Beauty, Grace & Stella, Clinique, EltaMD, Opalescence Go, Supergoop!, Clean Skin Club, La Roche-Posay, Dove, Vacation, Hero Cosmetics, Lancôme, Estēe Lauder, Neutrogena, Milk Makeup, Saie, Levi's, Vera Bradley, Bogg Bags, Crz Yoga, Brooks, BedHead, Rothy's, Adidas, Ray-Ban, Ryka, Hey Dude, BaubleBar, Oura Ring, Noco, Ring, Blink, Bose, Sony, Shokz, Sonos, Anker, Govee, Asus Rog, Belkin, TCL, Google Pixel, Epson, FitBit, Hatch Restore, Eufy, Tangle Teezer, Color Wow, Ouai, Olaplex, Nioxin, Amika, Nutrafol, Ouidad, Dyson Supersonic, T3, Dae, Pantene, Stanley, Instant Pot, Le Creuset, Vitamix, Yeti, Caraway, Our Place, Fullstar, Bentgo, HydroJug, Simplehuman, Dash, Scrub Daddy, iRobot, Canopy, Midea, Dreo, Black+Decker, Febreze, Blueair, Dewalt, Hoover, Beckham Hotel, Purple, Mellanni, YouCopia, Command, Ruggable, Rachio, Boll & Branch, Orgain, AG1, Celsius Energy, Peloton, Vital Proteins, Bloom, Lemme, Puma, DripDrop, Body Armor, Beam Creatine, Woof Pupsicle, Furbo, Full Moon, Hill's Science Diet, Seresto, Petlibro, Wuffes, Temptations, Greenies, Merrick, Stella & Chewy's, Chom Chom Roller, Uproot Clean, David, Nespresso, Four Sigmatic, Kind Bars, Freestyle Snacks, Olipop, Ryze Superfoods, Hint, Think!, Magic Spoon, Truff, and Ayoh!.

articles.title: Using washing up liquid an 'impossible to beat' solution for cleaning showers
articles.author: Ben Lyons
articles.summary: Flair Showers suggests using diluted washing up liquid as a cleaning solution for shower doors, claiming it is effective and reduces effort. They also recommend using lemon for removing soap scum and hard water stains.

articles.title: You Can Get the Whoop 5.0 (and a One-Year Membership) for $169 During Prime Day
articles.author: Beth Skwarecki
articles.summary: Whoop offers the Whoop 5.0 fitness tracker for $169 with a 12-month membership.

articles.title: Samsung's new Galaxy is already much more affordable thank you think
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the new Galaxy Z Flip 7, featuring a larger outer screen and a 6.9-inch foldable OLED display. The phone is available for pre-order with contract deals through Mobiles.co.uk and iD Mobile, offering 512GB storage for the price of the 256GB model as a pre-order incentive.

articles.title: Cook Smarter: Best Pressure Cookers for Indian Kitchens
articles.summary: New cookware features lightweight and budget-friendly designs with options like anti-spill lids and durable stainless steel. The cookware boasts curved bodies for easy stirring, rust-resistant stainless steel, and efficient heat distribution, suitable for gas and induction cooking, with compact options available for small families.

articles.title: Meet IONIQ 6 N, Hyundai's fastest car yet
articles.summary: Hyundai has unveiled the 2026 IONIQ 6 N, a high-performance electric sedan with a dual-motor all-wheel-drive system producing up to 641hp. It can accelerate from 0-100km/h in 3.2 seconds using N Launch Control and includes features like N e-Shift and Ambient Light Shift N technology, with an expected price around $60,000.

articles.title: 28 Products With Such Riveting Results, You'll Question Why You Waited So Long To Buy Them
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Nivea introduces a lightweight gel cream with Q10 to improve skin firmness. Good Molecules launches Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel to reduce swelling and puffiness. Gold Bond releases a firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil to improve skin texture and elasticity. Sol de Janerio has launched Brazilian Bum Bum body cream featuring guarana extract, coconut oil, and caffeine to smooth and tighten your skin.

articles.title: Robo Pop ice cream machine opens at Brighton train station
articles.author: Francesca Williams
articles.summary: Robo Pop has launched its first robotic ice cream vending machine in the UK. The machine serves Mr Whippy ice cream with a variety of sauces and toppings, creating customized ice cream orders in 30 seconds. To celebrate the launch, Robo Pop is offering free ice cream to the first 100 customers and hosting a selfie area.

articles.title: India made Ai+ smartphone is here!
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: NxtQuantum has launched the Ai+ Smartphone, which is India's first fully authored smartphone. The Ai+ Smartphone is built entirely in India, governed on Indian infrastructure and designed to deliver world-class performance with uncompromising data privacy. The model is powered by NxtQuantum OS, India's first sovereign mobile operating system.

articles.title: 27 Sephora Hair Products That Are Basically Magical
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: The article highlights several recently launched or updated hair care products from various companies.  These include Emi Jay's hair oil and smoothing stick, Ouai's invisible dry shampoo, Gisou's honey hair mask, Color Wow's hairspray, Moroccanoil's frizz control serum, Dae's leave-in conditioner spray, Crown Affair's shampoo and dry shampoo, Amika's frizz-fighting treatment, JVN's blowout styling milk, a vegan smoothing gel, Pattern styling cream, Olaplex purple toning shampoo, IGK's 4-in-1 prep spray, Nécessaire rosemary conditioner, Davines foam, Briogeo rosemary pre-wash scalp oil, Fable & Mane scalp scrub, Living Proof dry shampoo, Sol de Janeiro hair and body mist, Pureology leave-in conditioner, L'Oréal Professionnel color-protecting shampoo, Fenty Hair moisture repair shampoo, Bumble and Bumble thickening texture spray and Bread Beauty curl-defining mousse. Each product aims to address specific hair concerns and enhance hair quality, offering consumers a wide range of options for their hair care routines.

articles.title: Brands bat for innovative print advertising
articles.summary: Mankind launched an innovative ad campaign for its Manforce condom brand featuring a scented newspaper ad. Samsung promoted its Galaxy S25 Ultra mobile phone through newspaper ads with a QR code that enabled readers to experience the AI-powered product. Instamart and Flipkart Minutes also used special inks to promote their product.

articles.title: 上海新阳：公司开发的晶圆制造用化学机械研磨液主要包括适用于浅槽隔离研磨液、金属钨研磨液等系列产品_手机网易网
articles.author: 每日经济新闻
articles.summary: Shanghai Sinyang (300236.SZ) has developed chemical mechanical polishing slurries for wafer manufacturing. These slurries include STI Slurry, W Slurry, Cu Slurry, Oxide Slurry, and Poly Slurry, covering 14nm and above technology nodes.

articles.title: Samsung unveils its new line of foldable devices at Unpacked
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled its new line of foldable devices, including the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and a smart watch, at the Unpacked event in New York on Wednesday.

articles.title: Everything On This List Is Under $25 *And* On Sale For Prime Day — But Only Until Tomorrow, So Chop Chop
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Several companies have launched deals on their popular products during Amazon Prime Day. Blueland offers a discount on its hypoallergenic laundry detergent tablets. Supergoop provides a deal on their best-selling Glowscreen SPF 40. Amazon offers 50% discount on Amazon Fire TV stick. Burt's Bees offers after sun lotion for 38% off. Dawn offers Powerwash Gain Original Dish Spray for 34% off and Cosrx offers snail mucin repairing essence for 48% off. Touchland provides 30% off on their travel-friendly Glow Mist hydrating hand sanitizer. Maple Holistics offers sulfate-free biotin shampoo for 28% off. Mighty Patch and Mixsoon also offers discount on their skin care products.

articles.title: Best high capacity washing machines to handle heavy loads with gentle care: Top 5 options from with smart tech
articles.summary: Samsung introduces its 12 kg front-load washing machine featuring AI Control, AI Ecobubble technology, and Super Speed mode, while LG presents its 9 kg top-load washing machine with AI Direct Drive technology and steam wash. Voltas Beko offers a 10 kg semi-automatic washing machine with Double Waterfall technology, and Haier showcases its 9 kg front-load washer with a Direct Motion Motor and PuriSteam function. IFB's Fully Automatic Washing Machine boasts 9 Swirl Wash technology powered by AI and Steam Refresh.

articles.title: Behold, Hyundai's new 641hp track-focused EV: the Ioniq 6 N
articles.summary: Hyundai has introduced the Ioniq 6 N, featuring a twin-motor setup delivering up to 641hp with the 'N Grin Boost' and improved motors for sustained performance. The car includes enhancements like 'N Drift Optimizer,' 'N e-Shift,' and 'N Active Sound+,' along with redesigned suspension and styling for track-focused capabilities.

articles.title: Xiaomi Phones Receive Android 16 HyperOS Update
articles.summary: Xiaomi is rolling out its new operating system, HyperOS 1.0, to 16 devices globally, unifying its ecosystem. The update enhances performance, security, and connectivity across Xiaomi's diverse product lines. Later versions like HyperOS 2.2 and HyperOS 3 are also mentioned with improvements and expansion to more devices.

articles.title: Pokemon GO Reveals Dynamax Legendary Debuts for Max Battle Weekend
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon GO is introducing Dynamax Latios and Dynamax Latias. These new features are debuting during an upcoming event within the game.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: A New Era of Personalized, Multimodal Experiences
articles.summary: Samsung is launching several new products, including the Galaxy Z Fold 6 with an adaptive display and improved S Pen, the Galaxy S25 series emphasizing camera and audio enhancements through AI, and the Galaxy Watch 7 featuring advanced health monitoring. The company is also expanding Galaxy AI features across its ecosystem for a more unified experience, highlighting personalized and multimodal interactions.

articles.title: Microsoft Korea: Education Commercial Executive
articles.summary: A leading technology firm launched a groundbreaking AI system designed to significantly boost customer engagement. The new AI platform leverages advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze data, predict customer behavior, and tailor interactions. It aims to automate routine queries, provide intelligent support, and free up human agents for complex issues.

articles.title: Preorder Samsung's New Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Fold 7, Save $120
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a free storage upgrade for customers who preorder their new foldable phones.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold's performance may lag behind Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7 globally, featuring advanced features and a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip. Google's Pixel 10 Pro Fold is slated to debut next month, setting the stage for competition in the foldable smartphone market.

articles.title: du launches Experience X internship program to empower UAE national youth
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: du, a telecom and digital services provider, has launched Experience X. The new service aims to foster an enriched experience for customers.

articles.title: Yujiang in China's Jiangxi attracts numerous well-known enterprises in eyewear industry
articles.author: 新华网
articles.summary: Rokid, a Hangzhou-based technology company, has developed smart glasses. The smart glasses were demonstrated at Rokid's flagship store in Yujiang District of Yingtan on July 10, 2025.

articles.title: Python-powered AI agents are here
articles.author: Info World
articles.summary: Google introduced the Agent Development Kit for Python, enabling developers to engage with agentic AI. The Python client API allows tapping into Google's Data Commons libraries.

articles.title: This complete DJI drone package is "best for beginners" and down to its lowest-ever price ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: DJI offers the Mini 4K Drone Bundle for £259 as part of a Prime Day deal, targeting beginners.

articles.title: Huawei launches next-gen devices at ‘Fashion Next' showcase in Dubai
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Huawei launched its latest line-up of smart devices at a product launch event in Dubai. The event, themed 'Fashion Next,' demonstrated the company's focus on blending innovation with human-centric design.

articles.title: Aspira Nigeria expands dental care range with launch of New Oracare+Red Gel Toothpaste
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Aspira Nigeria Ltd. launched Oracare+ Red Gel Toothpaste, which is a new variant of their Oracare+ family products. The launch aims to build a culture of daily confidence and consumer-first thinking.

articles.title: Last chance budget-friendly Prime Day star projector deal — now under $14
articles.author: Space
articles.summary: YGiTK is offering a 26% discount on the Northern Galaxy Lights Projector, which is noted for its multifunctionality and quiet operation. The promotion ends today.

articles.title: Slideshow: New products from Nissin Foods, Di Fara Pizzeria and Food Lion
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: New frozen meals are now available in the frozen food section of stores, signifying a recent product launch.

articles.title: Tesco shoppers 'run' to find �35 'most perfect summer dress'
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Tesco F&F Clothing is selling a new dress. Fans describe the dress as 'stunning' and 'gorgeous'.

articles.title: Evangelion Store Launches Exclusive Summer Collection to Celebrate the Legacy of a Cultural Powerhouse
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: The leading destination for Neon Genesis Evangelion fans announced the launch of its all-new 2025 Summer Collection. This collection is designed for both die-hard fans and new enthusiasts of the mecha series.

articles.title: Samsung Exec Talks Galaxy Z Fold 7, Design And The Importance Of AI
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung launched its newest devices. Jay Kim, a senior executive, discussed these releases, emphasizing the importance of AI.

articles.title: Aston Martin Vantage S: Harder, Faster And Pointier
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Aston Martin is introducing the Vantage S, which it describes as the brand's most hardcore 'baby' model to date. This introduction represents a new product offering from the company.

articles.title: Ghost Of Yōtei has its own limited edition PS5 – here's where you can buy it
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Sony has announced two new PlayStation 5 products.

articles.title: \u2018IndiGo will offer fit-for-purpose products, value-for-money proposition to flyers\u2019
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: IndiGo's network and product are evolving, as revealed by Elbers. This suggests potential changes or introductions of new services within IndiGo's offerings.

articles.title: 'I love a pretty shoe': Paige Bueckers says Azzi Fudd helps her pick game sneakers
articles.author: ESPN
articles.summary: Steph Curry has an opportunity to promote his brand, potentially related to a new line of shoes. This effort focuses on increasing brand awareness and marketing Curry's associated product.

articles.title: See's Candies & McConnell's Fine Ice Creams debut new ice cream
articles.summary: See's Candies and McConnell's Fine Ice Creams are launching three new ice cream flavors for summer 2025 as a continuation of their partnership.

articles.title: Splurge Now, Save Later? 4 Things to Buy Before Prices Rise
articles.author: Tommy Tindall
articles.summary: LG is offering a new line of washers and dryers featuring AI Direct Drive (AI DD) technology. The new washers and dryers are designed to be energy efficient and feature smart functionalities.
